text: It should be noted that this result was potentially compromised by reduced power due to earlier termination of study.Kitagawa et al.1660,1661 published results from a RCT evaluating the clinical benefits of carboplatin plus paclitaxel compared with cisplatin plus paclitaxel for patients with FIGO stage IVB, persistent or recurrent cervical cancer.
